title: Mahindra sales rise 11 pc to 69,397 units in June
description: Mahindra & Mahindra reported an 11 percent increase in wholesales year on year for June, totaling 69,397 units. The company's total dispatches to dealers reached 62,429 units in June 2023.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
